Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is not just a purchase; it's an investment in enhancing your capabilities and efficiency. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we're extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially serving you soon! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
